reviews.review_msg: I fell asleep in most of the lectures and didn't attend a handful of them. I think the only reason I was able to pass with a B was because I went to high school in BC (therefore studied Canadian history and society). The term paper is really hard. Don't leave it to the last minute.

Karl is an amazing person: the kind of guy you should spark a conversation with after class. Though, his lectures are dry; the readings are all over the place; and he requires a LOT of reading (I am an avid reader, and I found it a lot). He's an easy marker, thank goodness! If he was a hard marker this course would not be doable. Not for first year
Really nice guy, always there to help and gives great feedback.  Lectures can be a little dry though.
He makes me want to sleep. ONLY take it if it required.
I found him not familiar with this lecture materials, he's like reading his lecture slides in no orders, very unorganized and boring.
I found his lecture unorganized...so hard to follow up, he switches topic very fast, and can not explain the concepts and his opinions clearly
the pro is not that interesting, but the content of the course is not bad!
if you take this course for W/B credits, i would say, you 'd better not....

Good teacher. His lectures can be dry, but he's trying!! He has these laughs once in a while..haha..but that's a good thing!!..yup..his midterms..essays..in just one hour!!!!INSANE!!..Again, the tutorials helped!

He's a very kind and gentel teacher .. very easy to talk to. His lecutres can be a bit unclear sometimes, but asking him questions insn't scary. Although there are a lot of readings to be done and assignments.
good prof, some funny jokes, very helpful if you needed it
Looks like Sean Connery! nice guy. Think it's just the class info that's boring, he teaches well lots of info. essays/tests fair if u do ur work.
good class, but i dont like the guy.
Way too socialist for my liking, but a very kind and intelligent individual.

I prefer better business communication. The lecture is dreadful and keeping students engaged is good but it shouldn't be so often and there should be a promotion of answers leading to the one that she/her wants.

I never write reviews but I had to for Deborah. She is the hardest marker I have ever encountered. SA 100W is interesting but she makes it so dull and somehow finds a way to give you bad marks. She isn't clear with what she expects from assignments and marks extra hard on top of it. DO NOT TAKE IF YOU DONT NEED THIS CLASS & DONT TAKE IF SHES THE TA

Did not enjoy my time in this prof's class, lectures were dry and the assigments were tedious. The course content could be really interesting but the way it is taught makes it super boring. My least favourite thing was the assignments, they didn't add to the course material in a meaningful way and were mostly just a bore to complete.

Ta's mark super hard for a 100 lvl class. They expect you to write like doctor's which us unfair. The course material is straight forward and simple, mostly common sense, but the way they mark kills your GPA.

Benita is an amazing professor!! She is clear on instructions and is a fair marker. She is such an inspirational professor. She really does care about the students in her class and tries to make their experience a very meaningful one. Although sometimes there may be a bit of reading, it is definitely worth the knowledge.

Ken is an awesome teacher,and is extremely cute... he makes it very clear on the material and what he really wants you to know. I have had two of his clases and i recommend him to anyone, just go to class! he explains this very well, and in a way he wants it to be understood.
Intense lectures with lots of notes - however, if you keep up with them you'll ace the exams. Lots of reading but material is usually covered in lecture.
